entry.title: You prayed like a good sinner
entry.summary:
Author: linochan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,773Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: Minho was just an acolyte, with far too many sins for someone his age. Chan was the new priest in the parish: young, composed… and deeply broken.When Minho’s confession takes an obscene turn, Chan is pulled into a spiral of guilt, obsession, and lust.But perhaps the sin was never Minho’s to begin with.
